shortdesc.ph: Checks whether the device supports camera torch.
Checks whether the device supports camera torch.

section.note: is only applicable to Android and iOS platforms. You must call this method after the SDK triggers the callback and returns the local video state as LOCAL_VIDEO_STREAM_STATE_CAPTURING (1). The app uses the front camera by default. If the front camera does not support torch, this method returns . If you want to check whether the rear camera supports torch, call before calling this method. On iPads running iOS 15, even if returns , due to system issues, calling may fail to turn on the torch.
